'''Cathŵenna''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|The kith present an odd trio, a broad-shouldered elf flanked by a tall aumaua and a wild-haired orlan. Each holds weapons at the ready as the woman steps forward. She bears an improvised flail made from a ball and chain.}}

Cathŵenna was imprisoned for ten years and broke her own ankle to release herself from chains, then joined up with [Hudango](/hudango/) and [Cemoc](/cemoc/) as she fled into the Crookspur wilderness, becoming a persistent plague on the slavers there.

'''Cathŵenna''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
{{Description|The kith present an odd trio, a broad-shouldered elf flanked by a tall aumaua and a wild-haired orlan. Each holds weapons at the ready as the woman steps forward. She bears an improvised flail made from a ball and chain.}}

Cathŵenna was imprisoned for ten years and broke her own ankle to release herself from chains, then joined up with [[Hudango]] and [[Cemoc]] as she fled into the Crookspur wilderness, becoming a persistent plague on the slavers there.
